sources.title: Boof E Koor
sources.description: Title: The Blind Owl - Boof-e koor (1975) Directed by: Kiumars Derambakhsh Date of birth: 1945, Iran Writing credits: Sadegh Hedayat (novel), Kiumars Derambakhsh Music: Ali Akbar Khan Year: 1975 Country: Iran Language: Farsi Color: Color Runtime: 55 min.
